    addVectorTiles

    addVectorTiles.Rd

    • Leaflet.VectorGrid API reference

    addVectorTiles(
  map,
  server,
  layer,
  layerId,
  style = list(fill = TRUE, fillColor = "purple", fillOpacity = 0.2, color = "purple",
    opacity = 0.7, weight = 0.1, radius = 0.8),
  styleHighlight = list(fill = TRUE, fillColor = "yellow", fillOpacity = 0.2, color =
    "red", opacity = 0.7, weight = 0.1, radius = 0.8),
  group = "",
  pane = "overlayPane",
  attribution = NULL
)

    Arguments

    map

    map object from leaflet::leaflet()

    server

    URL to tile server

    layer

    layer name

    layerId

    column name to uniquely identify each feature in layer

    style

    style as a list object

    group

    group

    pane

    pane in leaflet map

    attribution

    attribution for layer

    Value

    map object from leaflet::leaflet() with vector tile layer added

    Examples

    leaflet() |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(-122.4, 33.8, 4) |>
  addVectorTiles(
    server  = "https://tile.calcofi.io",
    layer   = "public.stations",
    layerId = "stationid")
#> Error in setView(addTiles(leaflet()), -122.4, 33.8, 4): could not find function "setView"
